alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 9:47AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations of one to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Blowing snow may temporarily reduce visibilities and recover roadways. * WHERE...Eastern Preston, Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, and Western Tucker Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Persons are urged to stay indoors until conditions improve. If you must go outside, dress in layers. Several layers of clothes will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat. Cover exposed skin to reduce your risk of frostbite or hypothermia. Gloves, a scarf, and a hat will keep you from losing your body heat. Please report snow or ice accumulations by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPittsburgh.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker
